评论详情: Mine arrived in great condition. Runs a little large. It's a nice thick, heavy sweater.  The cream colored material feels nice.  The black material on the shoulders is very stiff.

I’ve gotten some great pieces from RTR pre-owned but this sweater came covered in pills and lint. It looked like a sweater you would find hanging out on the floor of a thrift shop. Not sure how this got through quality control but I did not even try it on because of its gross condition.
